GitHub Enterprise Cloud
Your code, your choice

Take control with GitHub Enterprise Cloud—SaaS agility, enterprise-grade governance, security, and data residency on your terms.

Start free for 30 days
Contact sales
Repo webpage magnifying the URL highlighting https://contoso.ghe.com

Harness the agility and efficiency of the cloud with the control and data residency your enterprise seeks.

Choose where to store your code to meet your data residency preferences.
Engineered for enterprises with advanced security, governance, and management.
Move from on-prem to cloud and accelerate development with Copilot-powered DevOps.
Data residency options for more control


Enjoy greater flexibility by deciding where your most valuable asset, your code, is stored to meet your data residency needs.



Data residency in your desired region

Choose where your code and in-scope data is stored.


Powered by Microsoft Azure

Have confidence that your code is protected by Azure's global infrastructure and security.


Available in the following regions

Currently available in the European Union (EU), Australia, U.S. and Japan — with more regions coming soon.


Tailored to meet enterprise demands


Built for the complex needs of enterprises—offering comprehensive security, governance, and management capabilities.


Shift security left

Integrate security earlier in the development lifecycle with advanced tools to help identify and resolve potential issues sooner. 


Gain confidence through governance

Leverage enterprise governance capabilities to enforce your company’s compliance policies beyond your organizational boundaries.


Manage your users, access, and data with efficiency

GitHub’s identity platform simplifies user management and access control, while establishing a unique namespace on a custom domain to isolate your code from the open source cloud.


DevOps powered by the cloud for modern enterprises


Shift from on-prem to cloud and empower teams to build, test, and deploy software faster with an enterprise-grade DevOps platform.


Scale with confidence

Drive enterprise growth at scale with a flexible multi-tenant platform powered by Microsoft Azure’s reliable, performant, and highly available infrastructure.


Eliminate platform maintenance and downtime

Focus on building exceptional software while GitHub manages the infrastructure and maintenance, freeing your teams to prioritize building what’s next.


Unlock the power and innovation of the GitHub platform

Experience the breadth and power of GitHub’s Copilot-powered DevOps platform designed to enable collaboration and productivity and every step.


“
Implementing GitHub Enterprise Cloud with EU data residency has been transformative for ZEISS, ensuring compliance with EU regulations while boosting developer productivity with its rich features.
Henrik Boettcher
Tech Lead, Development Platforms
Explore resources

Explore our docs to learn more about the technical components of GitHub Enterprise Cloud with data residency.


Read the docs
GitHub Enterprise Trust Center

Access detailed FAQs and see how we enable developers and organizations to maximize their potential by prioritizing security, privacy, compliance, and transparency.


Explore Trust Center
Enterprise Development, Cloud Velocity

Download a brief PDF that summarizes the key benefits and capabilities of GitHub Enterprise Cloud with data residency.


Download PDF
Accelerate innovation at scale with the control you desire

Get started with GitHub Enterprise Cloud with data residency today.

Start free for 30 days
Contact sales

Primer_Brand__Text-module__Text--antialiased___fYDxq">Empower your DevOps teams with a unified platform that includes a suite of tools and capabilities to enhance the developer experience and spur innovation. From AI-powered code assistance with GitHub Copilot(1), automated CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions, and natively embedded security features with GitHub Advanced Security, to seamless collaboration and project management with GitHub Projects & Issues, GitHub Enterprise Cloud has the needs of the modern organization in mind. Move with velocity and scale confidently, supported by robust governance and management features that enforce policies, monitor activities, and maintain control over your development environment. Ensure your code remains within specified regions to meet your data residency preferences, all without the complexities of managing infrastructure. Backed by the reliability, performance, and flexibility of Microsoft Azure, GitHub Enterprise Cloud ensures your enterprise can innovate with confidence and at scale.
</p><p class="Primer_Brand__Text-module__Text___pecHN Primer_Brand__Text-module__Text-font--mona-sans___GpzSG Primer_Brand__Text-module__Text--default___DChoE Primer_Brand__Text-module__Text--300___TBQTB Primer_Brand__Text-module__Text--antialiased___fYDxq">Footnote (1): We encourage customers to carefully weigh the considerations of using GitHub Copilot in a data resident deployment, which may include certain data not stored in-region.
